text: Acestrorhynchus abbreviatus is a species of fish in the family Acestrorhynchidae. It was described by Edward Drinker Cope in 1878, originally under the genus Xiphorhamphus. It inhabits the Amazon and Madeira Rivers. It reaches a maximum standard length of . ==References== Category:Acestrorhynchidae Category:Fish described in 1878
title: Acestrorhynchus abbreviatus
